start.text: You find yourself in a dark forest. What will you do?

look_around.text: You see tall trees all around and hear rustling in the bushes. What next?

shout.text: Your voice echoes through the forest. Nothing responds. What will you do?

bushes.text: You find a small animal darting away. It looks like a rabbit. What next?

tree.text: You climb the tree and see a path leading out of the forest. What will you do?
